summary: Add `run_id` field to the `Temporal::Error::WorkflowExecutionAlreadyStarted` exception based on Rust SDK implementation. This issue is obsolete due to SDK rewrite.
userImpact: Users would have access to the run_id when catching WorkflowExecutionAlreadyStarted errors for better debugging.
proposedFix: Add run_id field to WorkflowExecutionAlreadyStarted exception similar to Rust SDK implementation
resolutionDetails: Issue became obsolete due to Ruby SDK rewrite/refresh and is no longer applicable to the current version
keyQuote: The SDK is undergoing a rewrite/refresh and this issue applied to a previous version and is no longer applicable
